solution_line_template: They both finished reading a total of {mcgregor_finished} + {floyd_finished} = <<{mcgregor_finished}+{floyd_finished}={total_finished}>>{total_finished} books.
Therefore, they still have to read a total of {total_assigned_books} - {total_finished} = <<{total_assigned_books}-{total_finished}={books_remaining}>>{books_remaining} books.
